hero.description: As Safeline Logistics, we add speed, security and innovation to your global trade with integrated logistics solutions in sea, road, air and rail transportation.

about.title: A Trusted Name in Logistics
about.description: Safeline Logistics, with its expert staff with more than 20 years of experience, provides integrated logistics services to the leading companies of the sector by creating alternative and innovative solutions regarding customer needs.
about.mission_desc: To provide innovative and sustainable value-added services to its customers by offering integrated logistics solutions.
about.vision_desc: To be a leading brand that maintains continuous growth and improves industry standards by innovative and solution-oriented approaches.
about.values_subtitle: The principles that guide our commitment to excellence in logistics
about.core_values_drawer_subtitle: The foundation of everything we do
values_desc: We aim to fully understand and meet customer needs by adopting a customer-focused approach in all pre- and post-sales processes.
We provide training opportunities for our employees to improve their capabilities, value their ideas, and encourage participation to build a strong team spirit.
We develop innovative, efficient, and eco-friendly solutions to provide sustainable value-added services for a better future.
We manage our business processes productively, use resources accurately, and aim for operational excellence with a strong result-oriented mindset.
We are committed to acting honestly and fairly towards our customers and stakeholders, adhering strictly to the principles of integrity and transparency.
We provide confidence to our customers by ensuring full compliance with quality standards and legal regulations, standing firmly behind our promises.
We are sensitive to society and the environment; we strive to minimize environmental impacts and create social value in all our business processes.
We adopt the highest ethical standards in our business activities and never compromise on the principles of honesty and reliability.
We continue to grow by evaluating opportunities for continuous improvement and development through innovative approaches that raise industry standards.
about.quality_desc: Customer Satisfaction: We adopt a customer-focused approach and keep customer satisfaction at the highest level. We strive to understand customer needs, meet their expectations and add value to them.
about.satisfaction_desc: Transparent and Quality Service: We provide our customers with open, transparent, reliable and high quality service in accordance with their needs and expectations.

certifications.title: Quality & Reliability
certifications.subtitle: Our documents proving service quality and reliability at international standards.

services.title: Integrated Logistics Solutions
services.subtitle: Innovative and sustainable transportation services that optimize your global supply chain.

sea.title: SEA FREIGHT
features: Heavy and Out of Gauge Transportation

land.title: LAND FREIGHT
features: Out Of Gauge and Heavy Weight Transportation

project.title: PROJECT LOGISTICS
features: HeavyLift and Out of Gauge Cargoes

services_bento.title: Our Services
services_bento.subtitle: End-to-end integrated logistics solutions for all your global shipping needs

land.title: Land Freight
land.desc: Reliable and fast road logistics solutions.
land.content: We offer FTL (Full Truck Load), LTL (Less Than Truck Load), FTL Express Service, Super Express Minivan, Out Of Gauge and Heavy Weight Transportation, and Transit Shipments globally.

air.title: Air Freight
air.desc: Fast and secure air cargo services worldwide.
air.content: Our solutions include General Cargo, Charter Flight Service, Cross and Transit Transportation, Hand Carry, Door to Door Delivery, DGR Transportation, and Space Allocation with Airlines.

sea.title: Sea Freight
sea.content: We provide FCL and LCL Loading, Special Equipment, Vessel Chartering, Heavy and Out of Gauge Transportation, Door to Door Delivery, Intermodal/Multimodal, and Weekly Regular Services.

rail.title: Rail Freight
rail.content: We support you with Container and Conventional Wagon Transportation, Project Transportation, Cross and Transit Shipment, Value Added Services, and Door to Door Service.

project.title: Project Logistics
project.desc: Expert solutions for special and heavy cargo.
project.content: We offer Logistics Consulting, Route Planning, HeavyLift, Project Vessel Chartering, Port Handling, Escort Vehicle Arrangement, and Turnkey Project Solutions.

warehouse.title: Warehousing & Customs
warehouse.desc: Secure storage and expert customs support.
warehouse.content: Our modern warehousing facilities feature 24/7 security, inventory management, order fulfillment, and professional customs clearance to streamline your operations.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Get a quote for your logistics needs.
contact.address: Enka Binası, Esentepe Mahallesi, Büyükdere Caddesi No:108 K:9

footer.description: The trusted name in global logistics. We carry your business to the world with 20+ years of experience and innovative solutions.
footer.newsletter_desc: Join our mailing list for industry updates and news.

cookies.title: We Value Your Privacy
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept", you agree to our use of cookies.
